name: Prazepam
summary: Prazepam is a benzodiazepine derivative primarily used for the treatment of anxiety disorders. It has a long half-life and is metabolized to desmethyldiazepam, which contributes to its prolonged effects.
description: Prazepam is an anxiolytic medication belonging to the benzodiazepine class. It is indicated for the short-term treatment of anxiety disorders and symptoms. Compared to some other benzodiazepines, prazepam is less sedating initially but produces a sustained calming effect due to its active metabolite. It is generally reserved for cases where a long duration of action is beneficial. Prazepam is not widely available in the United States but is prescribed in certain European and other countries.

off_label_uses: Adjunctive therapy in depression with anxiety

items: Treatment of adjustment disorders with prominent anxiety

sections.text: Prazepam enhances the activity of gamma-aminobutyric acid (GABA) at the GABA-A receptor, increasing chloride ion influx and producing neuronal hyperpolarization, resulting in anxiolytic and sedative effects.
